name: Roboat Racing
description:
Roboat Racing in an arcade boat racing game where players control the two engines of their boat separately. Race through the track with up to 3 other players using  these momentum based racing controls!

Features

  • Play in a bright world set in an exciting demo track in Megaman Legends inspired low poly artstyle
  • Play as one of four fun ship captain: I. Patch, Mack Erel, Octabella and Haz Matt
  • Play with up to 3 other friends - support for 4 player split screen
  • Race to improve - see your stats at the end of each race

Note: A controller is required to play Roboat Racing.

This game was developed by Moonwalk Studios over the past 4 months by the following members:

3D Artist - Ravnik Jagpal
2D/UI Artist - Alain Sangalang
Gameplay Programmer - Jackson Rushing
Technical Programmer - Daniel MacCormick
Game Design/UR - Wen Bo Yu
